children.text: The skirting board has been installed with a gap to the flooring, which looks poorly finished and needs to be rectified.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 10.01 Joints in timber, stone and laminated bench tops states that
‘Gaps between skirting and flooring are defective if they exceed 2mm within the first 24 months after handover and are visible from a normal viewing position’ .
This must be rectified in accordance with above.
